channel.title: Server help [317]
channel.description:
Hey All, I need help with the server, i have problem that the ground color is white (snowy) i wanna change it to green (Normal) can any1 help pm me in skype or Reply here,
tyvm

item.title: Server help [317]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You downloaded Aggroth (I think), and there should be a mini-tutorial on how to change it in the main post.
And this should be in the client help, because it’s mainly client sided.

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:1, topic:534827”][color=red]If you wish to remove the snow textures,

replace this case:

with this:

private void readValues(Stream stream) { do { int i = stream.readUnsignedByte(); boolean dummy; if(i == 0) return; else if(i == 1) { anInt390 = stream.read3Bytes(); method262(anInt390); } else if(i == 2) anInt391 = stream.readUnsignedByte(); else if(i == 3) dummy = true; else if(i == 5) aBoolean393 = false; else if(i == 6) stream.readString(); else if(i == 7) { int j = anInt394; int k = anInt395; int l = anInt396; int i1 = anInt397; int j1 = stream.read3Bytes(); method262(j1); anInt394 = j; anInt395 = k; anInt396 = l; anInt397 = i1; anInt398 = i1; } else { System.out.println("Error unrecognised config code: " + i); } } while(true); }[/quote]

Read full topic
